reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of PHYS 200, PHYS 250. (ASTR 300 is recommended.)
Note PHYS 250 is also an eligible prerequisite. Students with PHYS 250 wanting to register in this course please contact the Physics and Astronomy Undergrad Program Coordinator with your student number for registraiton help.
description: Introduction to the study of the Universe as a whole. Foundations of the Hot Big Bang model, the early Universe, nucleosynthesis, the cosmic microwave background, large-scale structure, galaxy formation and quasars. Credit will be granted for only one of ASTR 403 or PHYS 571.
